mapper.sql: stu_id, stu_no, stu_name, stu_login, stu_passwd, stu_phone, stu_limit, stu_remain, stu_note, college_id
mapper.select: select stu_id,stu_no,stu_name,stu_phone,stu_remain from student order by stu_id desc
select stu_id,stu_no,stu_name,stu_phone,stu_remain from student where stu_name like #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into student (stu_id, stu_no, stu_name, stu_login, stu_passwd, stu_phone, stu_limit, stu_remain, stu_note, college_id) values (#{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stuNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuPasswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuPhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{stuLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stuRemain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stuNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collegeId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into student
stu_id,
stu_no,
stu_name,
stu_login,
stu_passwd,
stu_phone,
stu_limit,
stu_remain,
stu_note,
college_id,

mapper.update:
update student
stu_no = #{stuNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
stu_name = #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stu_login = #{stuLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stu_passwd = #{stuPasswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stu_phone = #{stuPhone,jdbcType=CHAR},
stu_limit = #{stuLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stu_remain = #{stuRemain,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stu_note = #{stuNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
college_id = #{collegeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update student set stu_no = #{stuNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, stu_name = #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stu_login = #{stuLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stu_passwd = #{stuPasswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stu_phone = #{stuPhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, stu_limit = #{stuLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stu_remain = #{stuRemain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stu_note = #{stuNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, college_id = #{collegeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
